item.title: 陷入困境的国债市场期待就业报告带来喘息机会
item.description: 受挫的美国政府债券市场正在寻求周五 12 月份就业报告的缓和。【原文：The beaten-down US government bond market is looking for a reprieve from Friday’s December employment report.】

item.title: 华尔街从就业报告中看到股市风险
item.description: 降息对股市牛市有多重要？对于风险资产投资者来说，这是一个迫切的问题，他们最近一直在努力忽视债券市场对通胀风险的激动反应。【原文：How important are rate cuts to the bull case on equities? It's a pressing question for investors in risky assets, who've lately struggled to ignore the bond market's agitated reaction to inflation risk.】

item.title: 加拿大计划在特朗普发动贸易战时采取广泛的关税报复措施
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，如果唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）兑现对加拿大商品征收25%关税的威胁，加拿大正在制定对美国产品征收广泛关税的计划。【原文：Canada is drawing up plans for extensive tariffs against US products if Donald Trump follows through on his threat to put 25% levies on Canadian goods, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 欧盟将支持德拉吉关于落后于美国和中国的警告
item.description: 根据彭博社看到的一份报告草案，欧盟将警告说，欧盟单一市场的一体化进程正在放缓，与此同时，欧盟正面临着包括美国和中国在内的全球主要经济体日益加剧的压力。【原文：The European Union is set to warn that the integration of the bloc’s single market is slowing down at the same time it’s facing stiffening pressure from major global economies including the US and China, according to a draft report seen by Bloomberg.】

item.title: 从六张图表看英国今年糟糕的市场开局
item.description: 新年伊始，投资者对英国的财政状况忧心忡忡，英国资产遭遇了一个可怕的开局，这让人们再次回忆起 2022 年的市场危机，当时的前首相利兹-特拉斯（Liz Truss）因此下台。【原文：UK assets have suffered a horrendous start to the new year as investors fret about the country’s finances, reigniting memories of a market crisis in 2022 that brought down former Prime Minister Liz Truss.】

item.title: TikTok 最高法院的冲突将言论自由与美国安全对立起来
item.description: TikTok 社交媒体平台的未来取决于美国最高法院的一场冲突，这场冲突将国家安全与言论自由对立起来，将一位总统与另一位总统对立起来。【原文：The future of the wildly popular social media platform TikTok rides on a US Supreme Court clash that pits national security against free speech – and one president against another.】

item.title: 火星公司筹集 10 亿美元私人债务，为发行更大规模债券拉开序幕
item.description: 知情人士透露，玛氏公司正在通过私人配售债券借入相当于 10 亿美元的资金，因为该公司开始偿还为帮助收购食品制造商 Kellanova 而借入的银行贷款。【原文：Mars Inc. is borrowing the equivalent of $1 billion through privately-placed bonds, people with knowledge of the matter said, as it begins to repay bank loans it took out to help buy foodmaker Kellanova.】

item.title: 在全球波动中，印度出现自 2020 年以来最大规模的债券外流
item.description: 海外投资者抛售印度债务的速度是自大流行病以来从未有过的，因为全球债券市场因担心通胀持续而出现抛售。【原文：Overseas investors sold Indian debt at a pace not seen since the pandemic, as bond markets around the world sold off due to jitters about sticky inflation.】

item.title: 台湾部长称特朗普的影响力受其单一任期限制
item.description: 台湾经济部长表示，唐纳德-特朗普及其政策的影响将是有限的，因为他只能担任一个任期。这番罕见的坦率言论表明，世界各国政府正在如何博弈这位当选总统的重新上任。【原文：Taiwan’s economic minister said the impact of Donald Trump and his policies will be limited because he can only serve a single term, rare frank comments that show how governments around the world are gaming out the president-elect’s return to office.】

item.title: 花旗策略师称全球股市到 2025 年底将反弹 10
item.description: 花旗集团（Citigroup Inc.【原文：Global stocks are likely to rally 10% this year, underpinned by robust corporate earnings growth and equity gains broadening outside the US, according to Citigroup Inc. strategists.】

item.title: 哥伦比亚人担心贪污腐败，彼得罗的不支持率上升
item.description: 由于哥伦比亚人对腐败和犯罪问题忧心忡忡，古斯塔沃-彼得罗总统的不支持率在 12 月份上升，超过了其他地区领导人。【原文：President Gustavo Petro’s disapproval ratings rose in December, topping that of other regional leaders, as Colombians fret about corruption and crime.】

item.title: 卢拉的不支持率创下新高，巴西人对经济持悲观态度
item.description: 12 月，巴西总统路易斯-伊纳西奥-卢拉-达席尔瓦（Luiz Inacio Lula da Silva）的不支持率达到了其任期内的最高水平，人们对这位左派总统的经济管理日益不满。【原文：Disapproval of Brazil’s Luiz Inacio Lula da Silva reached the highest level of his term in December on growing frustration with the leftist president’s economic stewardship.】

item.title: 对石油制裁的担忧促使亚洲买家寻求替代品
item.description: 印度和中国的炼油厂增加了从中东和其他地区的原油采购量，因为他们担心进一步限制从俄罗斯和伊朗的进口可能会压制原油供应。【原文：Oil refiners in India and China have increased crude purchases from the Middle East and other regions amid concern that further restrictions on imports from Russia and Iran may crimp access to supplies.】

item.title: 随着经济萎缩，2024 年德国公司破产数量激增
item.description: 2024 年，德国企业破产率猛增近 17%，因为该国企业在经济萎缩的压力下不堪重负。【原文：German company insolvencies jumped almost 17% in 2024 as the country’s businesses buckled under the strain of a shrinking economy.】

item.title: 英国市场获得喘息机会，收益率接近十年高点
item.description: 英国债券和货币交易员忙碌的一周即将结束，收益率接近多年来的最高水平，英镑接近 2023 年底以来的最弱水平。【原文：A hectic week for UK bond and currency traders is coming to an end with yields stuck near the highest levels in years and the pound close to its weakest since late 2023.】

item.title: 巴基斯坦航空公司在新的股权出售计划之前恢复欧洲航班
item.description: 据巴基斯坦国有电台报道，在欧洲航空安全局解除为期四年的安全标准禁令六周后，巴基斯坦国际航空公司于周五恢复了飞往欧洲的航班。巴基斯坦国家航空公司的股票上涨。【原文：Pakistan International Airlines resumed its flights to Europe on Friday six weeks after the European Aviation Safety Agency lifted its four-year safety standards ban, the state-owned Radio Pakistan reported. Shares of the national carrier rose.】

item.title: 经济阴霾加深，中国市场支撑乏力
item.description: 中国打击看跌交易员的行动升级，但未能消除人们对世界第二大经济体正走向通货紧缩的担忧。【原文：An escalation of China’s fight against bearish traders has failed to allay fears that the world’s second-largest economy is headed for a deflationary spiral.】

item.title: 新闻业如何适应人工智能时代
item.description:
新闻业务正面临着下一个巨大挑战。以下是八个既乐观又偏执的理由。【原文：

The news business is facing its next enormous challenge. Here are eight reasons to be both optimistic and paranoid.

】

item.title: 关于全球政府债券大跌的更多信息
item.description:
所有举动的背后是什么？【原文：

What's behind all the moves.

】

item.title: 他创建了俄罗斯最大的科技公司。现在，他要在没有普京的情况下重新开始—。
item.description:
这位互联网公司Yandex的联合创始人在战争开始后流亡国外。【原文：

The co-founder of internet company Yandex went into exile after the war began.

】

item.title: 关于全球政府债券大跌的更多信息
item.description: 关于全球政府债券大跌的更多信息【原文：Lots More on the Global Selloff in Government Bonds】

item.title: 研究称，随着印度央行放弃准托市制，卢比可能跌破 1 美元兑 90 卢比
item.description: 据 Gavekal Research 公司称，印度卢比今年可能会跌破 1 美元兑 90 卢比的汇率，因为货币当局准备放弃该货币对美元的隐性准挂钩。【原文：The Indian rupee may fall past 90 per dollar this year as the monetary authority prepares to ditch the currency’s implicit quasi-peg to the dollar, according to Gavekal Research.】

item.title: 回购使日本公司成为 2024 年最大的股票买家
item.description: 去年，日本企业购买了创纪录数量的国内股票，成为股票的最大买家，因为它们进行了积极的股票回购。【原文：Japanese corporations bought a record amount of domestic stocks last year, becoming the biggest buyer of equities as they carried out aggressive share repurchases.】

item.title: 市场动荡后，富达和 Pimco 坚持英国金边债券押注
item.description: 太平洋投资管理公司（Pacific Investment Management Co.）、富兰克林邓普顿公司（Franklin Templeton）和富达国际公司（Fidelity International）等投资者在本周英国国债暴跌后坚持押注英国国债，其中一些投资者希望买入更多英国国债。【原文：Pacific Investment Management Co., Franklin Templeton and Fidelity International are among investors sticking to their bets on UK government bonds after this week’s slump, with some looking to buy more.】

item.title: 据说日本央行将考虑因大米和日元而上调通胀预期
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，日本央行官员可能会在本月晚些时候的政策会议上讨论上调通胀前景的问题，但目前尚未做出利率决定。【原文：Bank of Japan officials are likely to discuss raising their inflation outlook at a policy meeting later this month, although no rate decision has been made yet at this point, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 国际货币基金组织（IMF）下调 2025 年预测，对香港经济增长不再乐观
item.description: 国际货币基金组织（International Monetary Fund）下调了对香港今年经济增长的预测，并警告说，随着香港与中国大陆更加紧密地融合，亚洲金融之都将面临风险。【原文：The International Monetary Fund lowered its forecast for Hong Kong’s economic growth this year and warned of the risks Asia’s financial capital faces as it integrates more closely with mainland China.】

item.title: 日本 MUJI（无印良品）商店的所有者希望建造清洁发电厂
item.description: 拥有极简家居用品和家具品牌 MUJI 的日本公司 Ryohin Keikaku Co.【原文：Ryohin Keikaku Co., the Japanese firm that owns minimalist household goods and furniture brand Muji, will look to build clean power plants in an effort to meet its emissions targets.】

item.title: 寒流加剧，天气警告遍布欧洲
item.description: 欧洲大部分地区的气温将降至零度以下，气象机构警告说，多个国家将出现大雪。【原文：Temperatures are set to drop well below zero across much of Europe, with weather agencies warning of heavy snow in several countries.】

item.title: 风险缓解，欧洲天然气将出现一个月来首次周度下跌
item.description: 由于对市场供应的担忧有所缓解，欧洲天然气价格有望出现自 12 月中旬以来的首次单周下跌。【原文：European natural gas prices are poised for the first weekly decline since mid-December as concerns about market supply ease.】

item.title: 基金经理认为印度央行将在印度降息前提高流动性
item.description: 据印度一些最大的基金经理称，印度央行可能会在本季度开始降息之前采取措施，向银行系统注入现金。【原文：India’s central bank may take measures to inject cash in the banking system before it begins to cut interest rates this quarter, according to some of nation’s biggest fund managers.】
